subScenes.name: 提出申请
subScenes.description: 员工向经理礼貌提出出差请求

responses.text: Sure, what's up?
I'm in a meeting, can it wait?
Go ahead.

qaPairs.usageNote: 用轻松语气开启对话，避免突兀

qaPairs.speakerText: I'd like to apply for a business trip to Shanghai next week.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我想申请下周去上海出差。

responses.text: That sounds good. What's the purpose?
Can you send me the form first?
Okay, I'll approve it if it's urgent.

qaPairs.usageNote: 申请时直接说明目的，避免模糊

subScenes.name: 说明目的
subScenes.description: 清晰阐述出差的必要性和目标

qaPairs.speakerText: We need to meet the client face-to-face to finalize the contract.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我们需要当面和客户敲定合同。

responses.text: Makes sense — they've been delaying emails.
responses.text_cn: 有道理，他们一直拖邮件。

responses.text: Could we do a Zoom call instead?
Got it. When exactly do you need to go?

qaPairs.usageNote: 用具体理由增强说服力，避免空话

qaPairs.speakerText: The client said they won't sign unless we show up in person.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 客户说，除非我们亲自到场，否则不签合同。

responses.text: Alright, that's a solid reason.
Hmm, maybe we can send the legal team?
I'm convinced. Let's lock the dates.

qaPairs.usageNote: 强调对方明确要求，提升申请可信度

subScenes.name: 协商时间
subScenes.description: 讨论并确认出差的具体日期和时长

qaPairs.speakerText: I'm thinking of leaving Monday and coming back Thursday.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我打算周一出发，周四回来。

responses.text: Thursday's fine, but can you come back Wed?
responses.text_cn: 周四行，但能周三回来吗？

responses.text: Mon to Thu works for me.
responses.text_cn: 周一到周四我这边没问题。

responses.text: Wait, we've got a team meeting on Wed.
responses.text_cn: 等等，周三我们有团队会议。

qaPairs.usageNote: 提出时间建议后，主动询问对方意见

qaPairs.speakerText: I can fly out Sunday night if that helps.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 如果需要，我周日晚上就飞过去。

responses.text: That’s helpful — thanks for being flexible.
responses.text_cn: 这样更好，谢谢你灵活安排。

responses.text: Nah, just stick to Monday.
Book it then. I'll update the calendar.

qaPairs.usageNote: 主动调整时间体现合作态度

subScenes.name: 确认预算
subScenes.description: 确认差旅费用报销流程和额度

qaPairs.speakerText: What's the max daily allowance for hotels and meals?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 住宿和餐饮的每日上限是多少？

responses.text: It's $150/day — receipts required.
You're on expense report 3B, right?
Just don't go overboard.

qaPairs.usageNote: 主动询问标准，避免报销被拒

qaPairs.speakerText: I'll need to book a flight too — any preferred airline?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我还得订机票，有指定航司吗？

responses.text: Use Delta — we've got a corporate deal.
responses.text_cn: 用达美航空，公司有协议价。

responses.text: Just pick the cheapest.
Email accounting first to pre-approve.

qaPairs.usageNote: 提前确认流程，避免事后麻烦

subScenes.name: 安排交接
subScenes.description: 确保工作在出差期间有人接手

qaPairs.speakerText: I'll be out next week, so can you cover my client calls?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我下周不在，你能帮我接客户电话吗？

responses.text: I can handle them, but can you send me the notes?
responses.text_cn: 我可以，但你能发我备注吗？

responses.text: I'm swamped this week.
Sure, I'll take over. Just update the tracker.
responses.text_cn: 行，我接手，更新下跟踪表就行。

qaPairs.usageNote: 交接时提供具体资料，减少对方负担

qaPairs.speakerText: I'll leave all files in the shared folder and update the status.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我会把文件放共享文件夹，更新状态。

responses.text: Perfect, that makes things easy.
Don't forget to tag me in the updates.
Thanks, you're a lifesaver.

qaPairs.usageNote: 主动说明准备动作，体现责任感
